title: Transformations of Exponential Functions
body: The graph of $$f(x)=-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) {\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)}^{x-2}+4$$ is shifted downward $$4$$ units, and then shifted left $$2$$ units, stretched vertically by a factor of $$4$$, and reflected about the x-axis. What is the equation of the new function, g(x)?
